events.event-delete-confirmation: Estás seguro de que queres eliminar este evento?
events.new-notification-form-description: Mealie usa a biblioteca de Appprise para xerar notificacións. Ofrecen moitas opcións para que os servizos usen as notificacións. Consulte a súa wiki para obter unha guía completa sobre como crear o URL para o seu servizo. Se está dispoñible, a selección do tipo de notificación pode incluír funcións adicionais.
events.apprise-url-skipped-if-blank: URL de Apprise (omitido se está en branco)
events.what-events: A que eventos debería subscribirse este notificador?
events.when-a-user-in-your-group-creates-a-new-: Cando un usuario do teu grupo crea un novo plan de comidas
events.when-a-new-user-joins-your-group: Cando un novo usuario se une ao teu grupo

general.confirm-delete-generic: Estás seguro de que queres eliminar isto?
general.failure-uploading-file: Produciuse un erro ao cargar o ficheiro
general.name: Nome
general.subject: Asunto
general.title: Titulo
general.confirm-delete-generic-with-name: Estás seguro de que queres eliminar este {name}?
general.confirm-delete-own-admin-account: Ten en conta que estás tentando eliminar a túa propia conta de administrador. Esta acción non se pode desfacer e eliminarase permanentemente a túa conta?
general.your-browser-does-not-support-clipboard: O teu navegador non soporta o portapapeis
general.copied-items-to-clipboard: Non se copiou ningún elemento no portapapeis|Copiouse un elemento no portapapeis|Copiáronse {count} elementos no portapapeis
general.unsaved-changes: Tes cambios sen gardar. Queres gardar antes de saír? OK para gardar, Cancelar para descartar cambios.
general.clipboard-copy-failure: Produciuse un erro ao copiar contido no portapapeis.
general.confirm-delete-generic-items: Estás seguro de que queres eliminar os seguintes elementos?

group.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-grou: Estás seguro de que queres eliminar <b>{groupName}<b/>?
group.cannot-delete-default-group: Non se pode eliminar o grupo predeterminado
group.cannot-delete-group-with-users: Non se pode eliminar un grupo con usuarios
group.error-updating-group: Produciuse un erro ao actualizar o grupo
group.group-deletion-failed: Produciuse un erro ao eliminar o grupo
group.user-group-creation-failed: Produciuse un Erro na Creación do Grupo de Usuarios

settings.keep-my-recipes-private-description: Establece o teu grupo e todas as receitas como privados por defecto. Sempre podes cambiar isto máis tarde.

group.manage-members-description: Xestiona os permisos dos membros da túa casa. {manage} permítelle ao usuario acceder á páxina de xestión de datos {invite} permítelle xerar ligazóns de invitación para outros usuarios. Os propietarios do grupo non poden cambiar os seus propios permisos.
group.default-recipe-preferences-description: Estas son as opcións predeterminadas cando se crea unha nova receita no teu grupo. Pódense cambiar para receitas individuais no menú de configuración de receitas.
group.private-group-description: Setting your group to private will disable all public view options. This overrides any individual public view settings
group.enable-public-access-description: Fai que as receitas do grupo sexan públicas de forma predeterminada e permita que os visitantes vexan receitas sen iniciar sesión
group.allow-users-outside-of-your-group-to-see: Permite que os usuarios alleos ao teu grupo vexan as túas receitas

Cando estea activado, podes usar unha ligazón pública para compartir receitas específicas sen autorizar o usuario. Cando estea desactivado, só podes compartir receitas con usuarios que estean no teu grupo ou cunha ligazón privada xerada previamente
group.show-nutrition-information-description: Cando estea activado, a información nutricional mostrarase na receita se está dispoñible. Se non hai información nutricional dispoñible, a información nutricional non se mostrará
group.show-recipe-assets-description: Cando estea activado, os recursos da receita mostraranse na receita se están dispoñibles
group.default-to-landscape-view-description: Cando estea activado, a sección de cabeceira da receita mostrarase en horizontal
group.disable-users-from-commenting-on-recipes: Deshabilitar aos usuarios para comentar receitas
Oculta a sección de comentarios na páxina de receitas e desactiva os comentarios
group.disable-organizing-recipe-ingredients-by: Desactivar a organización dos ingredientes da receita por unidades e alimentos
Oculta os campos Comida, Unidade e Cantidade dos ingredientes e trata os ingredientes como campos de texto simple
group.admin-group-management-text: Os cambios neste grupo reflectiranse inmediatamente.

household.admin-household-management-text: Os cambios nesta casa reflectiranse inmediatamente.
household.private-household-description: Setting your household to private will disable all public view options. This overrides any individual public view settings
household.lock-recipe-edits-from-other-households: Lock recipe edits from other households
household.lock-recipe-edits-from-other-households-: When enabled only users in your household can edit recipes created by your household
household.default-recipe-preferences-description: These are the default settings when a new recipe is created in your household. These can be changed for individual recipes in the recipe settings menu.
household.allow-users-outside-of-your-household-to: Allow users outside of your household to see your recipes

When enabled you can use a public share link to share specific recipes without authorizing the user. When disabled, you can only share recipes with users who are in your household or with a pre-generated private link

meal-plan.mealplan-creation-failed: Produciuse un erro ao crear o menú
meal-plan.mealplan-deletion-failed: Produciuse un erro ao eliminar o menú
meal-plan.mealplan-update-failed: Produciuse un erro na actualización do menú
meal-plan.mealplan-households-description: If no household is selected, recipes can be added from any household
meal-plan.no-meal-plan-defined-yet: Aínda non se definiu ningún menú
meal-plan.no-meal-planned-for-today: Non hai ningunha comida prevista para hoxe
meal-plan.numberOfDays-hint: Número de días ao cargar a páxina
meal-plan.only-recipes-with-these-categories-will-: Só se utilizarán receitas con estas categorías nos Menús
meal-plan.meal-plan-rules-description: Podes crear regras para a selección automática de receitas para os teus menús. Estas regras son usadas polo servidor para determinar o grupo aleatorio de receitas para seleccionar ao crear menús. Teña en conta que se as regras teñen as mesmas restricións de día/tipo, fusionaranse as categorías das regras. Na práctica, é innecesario crear regras duplicadas, pero é posible facelo.
meal-plan.new-rule-description: Ao crear unha nova regra para un menú, pode restrinxir a regra para que se aplique a un día específico da semana e/ou a un tipo específico de comida. Para aplicar unha regra a todos os días ou a todos os tipos de comidas, pode establecer a regra en "Calquera" que a aplicará a todos os valores posibles para o día e/ou o tipo de comida.

migration.no-migration-data-available: Non Hai Datos de Migración Dispoñibles

chowdown.description-long: Mealie admite de forma nativa o formato do repositorio de chowdown. Descarga o repositorio de códigos como ficheiro .zip e cárgao a continuación.
chowdown.title: Chowdown

nextcloud.description: Migrar datos dunha instancia de Nextcloud Cookbook
nextcloud.description-long: As receitas poden ser importadas dun ficheiro zip que contén os datos almacenados en Nextcloud. Revise a estrutura de cartafoles de abaixo como exemplo para asegurar que as túas receitas pódense importar.
nextcloud.title: Nextcloud Cookbook

copymethat.description-long: Mealie pode importar receitas de Copy Me That. Exporta as túas receitas en formato HTML e sube aquí embaixo o zip.
copymethat.title: Xestor de Receitas Copy Me That

paprika.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from the Paprika application. Export your recipes from paprika, rename the export extension to .zip and upload it below.
paprika.title: Paprika Recipe Manager

mealie-pre-v1.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from the Mealie application from a pre v1.0 release. Export your recipes from your old instance, and upload the zip file below. Note that only recipes can be imported from the export.
mealie-pre-v1.title: Mealie Pre v1.0

tandoor.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from Tandoor. Export your data in the "Default" format, then upload the .zip below.
tandoor.title: Tandoor Recipes

migration.recipe-data-migrations-explanation: Recipes can be migrated from another supported application to Mealie. This is a great way to get started with Mealie.
migration.coming-from-another-application-or-an-ev: Coming from another application or an even older version of Mealie? Check out migrations and see if your data can be imported.
migration.nextcloud-text: Nextcloud recipes can be imported from a zip file that contains the data stored in Nextcloud. See the example folder structure below to ensure your recipes are able to be imported.
migration.chowdown-text: Mealie admite de forma nativa o formato do repositorio de chowdown. Descarga o repositorio de códigos como ficheiro .zip e cárgao a continuación.
migration.paprika-text: Mealie can import recipes from the Paprika application. Export your recipes from paprika, rename the export extension to .zip and upload it below.
migration.mealie-text: Mealie can import recipes from the Mealie application from a pre v1.0 release. Export your recipes from your old instance, and upload the zip file below. Note that only recipes can be imported from the export.

plantoeat.title: Plan to Eat
plantoeat.description-long: Mealie pode importar receitas de Plan to Eat.

myrecipebox.title: My Recipe Box
myrecipebox.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from My Recipe Box. Export your recipes in CSV format, then upload the .csv file below.

recipekeeper.title: Garda Receitas
recipekeeper.description-long: Mealie pode importar receitas do Garda Receitas. Exporta as túas receitas en formato zip e, a continuación, carga o ficheiro .zip abaixo.

new-recipe.error-details: Only websites containing ld+json or microdata can be imported by Mealie. Most major recipe websites support this data structure. If your site cannot be imported but there is json data in the log, please submit a github issue with the URL and data.
new-recipe.error-title: Looks Like We Couldn't Find Anything
new-recipe.paste-in-your-recipe-data-each-line-will: Paste in your recipe data. Each line will be treated as an item in a list
new-recipe.upload-individual-zip-file: Upload an individual .zip file exported from another Mealie instance.
new-recipe.url-form-hint: Copy and paste a link from your favorite recipe website
new-recipe.trim-whitespace-description: Trim leading and trailing whitespace as well as blank lines
new-recipe.trim-prefix-description: Trim first character from each line
new-recipe.split-by-numbered-line-description: Attempts to split a paragraph by matching '1)' or '1.' patterns

page.page-creation-failed: Produciuse un erro ao creala páxina
page.page-deletion-failed: Produciuse un erro ao eliminar a páxina
page.page-update-failed: Produciuse un erro na actualización da páxina
page.pages-update-failed: Produciuse un erro na actualización das páxinas

recipe.delete-confirmation: Estás seguro de que queres eliminar esta receita?
recipe.no-white-space-allowed: Non se Permiten Espazos en Branco
recipe.recipe-creation-failed: Produciuse un erro na creación da receita
recipe.recipe-update-failed: Produciuse un erro na actualización da receita
recipe.save-recipe-before-use: Garda a receita antes de usala
recipe.share-recipe-message: Quería compartir a miña receita de {0} contigo.
recipe.title: Titulo
recipe.unable-to-delete-recipe: Non se Puido Eliminar a Receita
recipe.failed-to-add-recipes-to-list: Failed to add recipe to list
recipe.failed-to-add-recipe-to-mealplan: Failed to add recipe to mealplan
recipe.timeline-is-empty: Nothing on the timeline yet. Try making this recipe!
recipe.timeline-no-events-found-try-adjusting-f: No events found. Try adjusting your search filters.
recipe.api-extras-description: Os extras de receitas son unha característica clave da API de Mealie. Permítenche crear pares de clave/valor JSON personalizados dentro dunha receita, para facer referencia desde aplicacións de terceiros. Podes usar estas teclas para proporcionar información, por exemplo, para activar automatizacións ou mensaxes personalizadas para transmitir ao dispositivo que desexes.
recipe.attach-images-hint: Attach images by dragging & dropping them into the editor
recipe.enable-ingredient-amounts-to-use-this-fe: Enable ingredient amounts to use this feature
recipe.recipes-with-units-or-foods-defined-cann: Recipes with units or foods defined cannot be parsed.
recipe.select-one-of-the-various-ways-to-create: Select one of the various ways to create a recipe
recipe.create-recipe-description: Create a new recipe from scratch.
recipe.create-recipe-from-an-image-description: Create a recipe by uploading an image of it. Mealie will attempt to extract the text from the image using AI and create a recipe from it.
recipe.crop-and-rotate-the-image: Crop and rotate the image so that only the text is visible, and it's in the correct orientation.
recipe.should-translate-description: Translate the recipe into my language
recipe.please-wait-image-procesing: Please wait, the image is processing. This may take some time.
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-providing-the-name-al: Create a recipe by providing the name. All recipes must have unique names.
recipe.new-recipe-names-must-be-unique: New recipe names must be unique
recipe.scrape-recipe-description: Scrape a recipe by url. Provide the url for the site you want to scrape, and Mealie will attempt to scrape the recipe from that site and add it to your collection.
recipe.scrape-recipe-have-a-lot-of-recipes: Have a lot of recipes you want to scrape at once?
recipe.import-from-zip-description: Import a single recipe that was exported from another Mealie instance.
recipe.zip-files-must-have-been-exported-from-m: .zip files must have been exported from Mealie
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-uploading-a-scan: Create a recipe by uploading a scan.
recipe.upload-a-png-image-from-a-recipe-book: Upload a png image from a recipe book
recipe.recipe-bulk-importer-description: The Bulk recipe importer allows you to import multiple recipes at once by queueing the sites on the backend and running the task in the background. This can be useful when initially migrating to Mealie, or when you want to import a large number of recipes.
recipe.recipe-debugger-description: Grab the URL of the recipe you want to debug and paste it here. The URL will be scraped by the recipe scraper and the results will be displayed. If you don't see any data returned, the site you are trying to scrape is not supported by Mealie or its scraper library.
recipe.recipe-debugger-use-openai-description: Use OpenAI to parse the results instead of relying on the scraper library. When creating a recipe via URL, this is done automatically if the scraper library fails, but you may test it manually here.

parser.experimental-alert-text: Mealie uses natural language processing to parse and create units and food items for your recipe ingredients. This feature is experimental and may not always work as expected. If you prefer not to use the parsed results, you can select 'Cancel' and your changes will not be saved.
parser.explanation: To use the ingredient parser, click the 'Parse All' button to start the process. Once the processed ingredients are available, you can review the items and verify that they were parsed correctly. The model's confidence score is displayed on the right of the item title. This score is an average of all the individual scores and may not always be completely accurate.
parser.alerts-explainer: Alerts will be displayed if a matching foods or unit is found but does not exists in the database.

backup.restore-fail: Restore failed. Check your server logs for more details
backup.error-creating-backup-see-log-file: Error Creating Backup. See Log File
backup.experimental-description: As copias de seguridade son instantáneas totais da base de datos e do directorio de datos do sitio. Isto inclúe todos os datos e non se pode configurar para excluír subconxuntos de datos. Podes pensar nisto como unha instantánea de Mealie nun momento específico. Estas serven como unha forma independente da base de datos para exportar e importar datos ou facer unha copia de seguridade do sitio nunha localización externa.
backup.back-restore-description: Restoring this backup will overwrite all the current data in your database and in the data directory and replace them with the contents of this backup. {cannot-be-undone} If the restoration is successful, you will be logged out.
backup.cannot-be-undone: This action cannot be undone - use with caution.
backup.postgresql-note: If you are using PostGreSQL, please review the {backup-restore-process} prior to restoring.
backup.irreversible-acknowledgment: Entendo que esta acción é irreversible, destrutiva e pode provocar a perda de datos

settings.remove-existing-entries-matching-importe: Remove existing entries matching imported entries

theme.error-creating-theme-see-log-file: Error creating theme. See log file.

token.copy-this-token-for-use-with-an-external: Copy this token for use with an external application. This token will not be viewable again.
token.you-have-token-count: You have no active tokens.|You have one active token.|You have {count} active tokens.

toolbox.recipes-affected: No Recipes Affected|One Recipe Affected|{count} Recipes Affected

webhooks.the-urls-listed-below-will-recieve-webho: The URLs listed below will receive webhooks containing the recipe data for the meal plan on it's scheduled day. Currently Webhooks will execute at
webhooks.description: The webhooks defined below will be executed when a meal is defined for the day. At the scheduled time the webhooks will be sent with the data from the recipe that is scheduled for the day. Note that webhook execution is not exact. The webhooks are executed on a 5 minutes interval so the webhooks will be executed within 5 +/- minutes of the scheduled.

settings.bug-report-information: Use this information to report a bug. Providing details of your instance to developers is the best way to get your issues resolved quickly.
settings.docker-volume-help: Mealie requires that the frontend container and the backend share the same docker volume or storage. This ensures that the frontend container can properly access the images and assets stored on disk.
settings.status-unknown-try-running-a-validation: Status Unknown. Try running a validation.
settings.application-version-error-text: A túa versión actual ({0}) non coincide coa última versión. Considera actualizar á última versión ({1}).
settings.secure-site-error-text: Serve via localhost or secure with https. Clipboard and additional browser APIs may not work.
settings.secure-site-success-text: Accédese ao sitio por localhost ou https
settings.server-side-base-url-error-text: `BASE_URL` is still the default value on API Server. This will cause issues with notifications links generated on the server for emails, etc.
settings.server-side-base-url-success-text: O URL do servidor non coincide co predeterminado
settings.ldap-ready-error-text: Non todos os valores LDAP están configurados. Isto pódese ignorar se non está a usar a Autenticación LDAP.
settings.ldap-ready-success-text: Required LDAP variables are all set.
settings.oidc-ready-error-text: Non todos os valores OIDC están configurados. Isto pódese ignorar se non está a usar a Autenticación OIDC.
settings.oidc-ready-success-text: Required OIDC variables are all set.
settings.openai-ready-error-text: Non todos os valores de OpenAI están configurados. Isto pódese ignorar se non está a usar as funcións de OpenAI.
settings.openai-ready-success-text: Required OpenAI variables are all set.

shopping-list.label: Label
shopping-list.linked-item-warning: This item is linked to one or more recipe. Adjusting the units or foods will yield unexpected results when adding or removing the recipe from this list.
shopping-list.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-ite: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
shopping-list.linked-recipes-count: No Linked Recipes|One Linked Recipe|{count} Linked Recipes
shopping-list.items-checked-count: No items checked|One item checked|{count} items checked
shopping-list.you-are-offline-description: Not all features are available while offline. You can still add, modify, and remove items, but you will not be able to sync your changes to the server until you are back online.
shopping-list.are-you-sure-you-want-to-check-all-items: Are you sure you want to check all items?
shopping-list.are-you-sure-you-want-to-uncheck-all-ite: Are you sure you want to uncheck all items?
shopping-list.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-checked-: Are you sure you want to delete all checked items?

signup.welcome-to-mealie: Welcome to Mealie! To become a user of this instance you are required to have a valid invitation link. If you haven't recieved an invitation you are unable to sign-up. To recieve a link, contact the sites administrator.

user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-link: Are you sure you want to delete the link <b>{link}<b/>?
user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-user: Are you sure you want to delete the user <b>{activeName} ID: {activeId}<b/>?
user.password-has-been-reset-to-the-default-p: Password has been reset to the default password
user.use-8-characters-or-more-for-your-passwo: Use 8 characters or more for your password
user.you-are-not-allowed-to-create-a-user: You are not allowed to create a user
user.you-are-not-allowed-to-delete-this-user: You are not allowed to delete this user
user.enable-advanced-content-description: Enables advanced features like Recipe Scaling, API keys, Webhooks, and Data Management. Don't worry, you can always change this later
user.please-enter-your-email-and-password: Please enter your email and password
user.account-locked-please-try-again-later: Account Locked. Please try again later
user.authentication-method-hint: This specifies how a user will authenticate with Mealie. If you're not sure, choose 'Mealie
user.user-can-invite-other-to-group: User can invite others to group
user.it-looks-like-this-is-your-first-time-lo: It looks like this is your first time logging in.
user.dont-want-to-see-this-anymore-be-sure-to: Don't want to see this anymore? Be sure to change your email in your user settings!
user.forgot-password-text: Please enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
user.changes-reflected-immediately: Changes to this user will be reflected immediately.

language-dialog.select-description: Choose the language for the Mealie UI. The setting only applies to you, not other users.
language-dialog.how-to-contribute-description: Is something not translated yet, mistranslated, or your language missing from the list? {read-the-docs-link} on how to contribute!

foods.merge-dialog-text: Combining the selected foods will merge the source food and target food into a single food. The source food will be deleted and all of the references to the source food will be updated to point to the target food.
foods.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with foods based on your local language. This will create 200+ common foods that can be used to organize your database. Foods are translated via a community effort.
foods.seed-dialog-warning: You have already have some items in your database. This action will not reconcile duplicates, you will have to manage them manually.
foods.label-overwrite-warning: This will assign the chosen label to all selected foods and potentially overwrite your existing labels.
foods.on-hand-checkbox-label: Setting this flag will make this food unchecked by default when adding a recipe to a shopping list.

units.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with common units based on your local language.
units.combine-unit-description: Combining the selected units will merge the Source Unit and Target Unit into a single unit. The {source-unit-will-be-deleted} and all of the references to the Source Unit will be updated to point to the Target Unit.

labels.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with common labels based on your local language.

recipes.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-all-expo: Are you sure you want to delete all export data?
recipes.confirm-delete-recipes: Are you sure you want to delete the following recipes? This action cannot be undone.
recipes.the-following-recipes-selected-length-wi: The following recipes ({0}) will be exported.
recipes.settings-chosen-explanation: Settings chosen here, excluding the locked option, will be applied to all selected recipes.
recipes.recipe-data-description: Use this section to manage the data associated with your recipes. You can perform several bulk actions on your recipes including exporting, deleting, tagging, and assigning categories.
recipes.data-exports-description: This section provides links to available exports that are ready to download. These exports do expire, so be sure to grab them while they're still available.

data-pages.data-management-description: Select which data set you want to make changes to.

user-registration.provide-registration-token-description: Please provide the registration token associated with the group that you'd like to join. You'll need to obtain this from an existing group member.
user-registration.group-details-description: Before you create an account you'll need to create a group. Your group will only contain you, but you'll be able to invite others later. Members in your group can share meal plans, shopping lists, recipes, and more!
user-registration.use-seed-data-description: Mealie ships with a collection of Foods, Units, and Labels that can be used to populate your group with helpful data for organizing your recipes.

banner-experimental.title: Experimental Feature
banner-experimental.description: This page contains experimental or still-baking features. Please excuse the mess.

demo.info_message_with_version: This is a Demo for version: {version}

help.selection-mode-desc: The selection mode is the main mode that can be used to enter data:

selection-mode-steps.draw: Draw a rectangle on the text you want to select.
selection-mode-steps.click: Click on any field on the right and then click back on the rectangle above the image.
selection-mode-steps.result: The selected text will appear inside the previously selected field.

help.pan-and-zoom-desc: Select pan and zoom by clicking the icon. This mode allows to zoom inside the image and move around to make using big images easier.

split-modes.line-mode-desc: In line mode, the text will be propagated by keeping the original line breaks. This mode is useful when using bulk add on a list of ingredients where one ingredient is one line.
split-modes.block-mode-desc: In block mode, the text will be split in blocks. This mode is useful when bulk adding instructions that are usually written in paragraphs.
split-modes.flat-mode-desc: In flat mode, the text will be added to the selected recipe field with no line breaks.

storage.title-backups-directory: Directorio de Copias de Seguridade (copias de seguridade)

maintenance.action-clean-directories-description: Elimina todos os cartafoles de receitas sin UUIDs válidos
maintenance.action-clean-temporary-files-description: Elimina todos os ficheiros e cartafoles do directorio .temp
maintenance.action-clean-images-description: Elimina todas as imaxes que non rematan en .webp
maintenance.actions-description: As accións de mantemento son {destructive_in_bold} e deben usarse con precaución. Realizar calquera destas accións é {irreversible_in_bold}.

admin.ingredients-natural-language-processor: Procesador de Linguaxe Natural de Ingredientes
admin.ingredients-natural-language-processor-e: Mealie usa Campos Aleatorios Condicionais (CACs) para analizar e procesar ingredientes. O modelo utilizado para os ingredientes baséase nun conxunto de datos de máis de 100.000 ingredientes dun conxunto de datos compilado polo New York Times. Teña en conta que, como o modelo está adestrado só en inglés, pode ter resultados variados ao usar o modelo noutros idiomas. Esta páxina é unha zona de xogos para probar o modelo.

Non é perfecto, pero dá excelentes resultados en xeral e é un bo punto de partida para analizar manualmente os ingredientes en campos individuais. Alternativamente, tamén pode usar o procesador "Bruto" que usa unha técnica de coincidencia de patróns para identificar ingredientes.
admin.background-tasks-description: Here you can view all the running background tasks and their status

setup.welcome-to-mealie-get-started: Welcome to Mealie! Let's get started
setup.already-set-up-bring-to-homepage: I'm already set up, just bring me to the homepage
setup.common-settings-for-new-sites: Here are some common settings for new sites
setup.here-are-a-few-things-to-help-you-get-st: Here are a few things to help you get started with Mealie
setup.restore-from-v1-backup: Have a backup from a previous instance of Mealie v1? You can restore it here.
setup.manage-profile-or-get-invite-link: Manage your own profile, or grab an invite link to share with others.

admin.debug-openai-services-description: Use this page to debug OpenAI services. You can test your OpenAI connection and see the results here. If you have image services enabled, you can also provide an image.

profile.description: Manage your profile, recipes, and group settings.
profile.account-summary-description: Here's a summary of your group's information.
profile.group-statistics-description: Your Group Statistics provide some insight how you're using Mealie.
profile.household-statistics-description: Your Household Statistics provide some insight how you're using Mealie.
profile.storage-capacity-description: Your storage capacity is a calculation of the images and assets you have uploaded.
profile.personal-description: These are settings that are personal to you. Changes here won't affect other users.
profile.user-settings-description: Manage your preferences, change your password, and update your email.
profile.api-tokens-description: Manage your API Tokens for access from external applications.
profile.group-description: These items are shared within your group. Editing one of them will change it for the whole group!
profile.group-settings-description: Manage your common group settings, like privacy settings.
profile.household-description: These items are shared within your household. Editing one of them will change it for the whole household!
profile.household-settings-description: Manage your household settings, like mealplan and privacy settings.
profile.cookbooks-description: Manage a collection of recipe categories and generate pages for them.
profile.members-description: See who's in your household and manage their permissions.
profile.webhooks-description: Setup webhooks that trigger on days that you have have mealplan scheduled.
profile.notifiers-description: Setup email and push notifications that trigger on specific events.
profile.manage-data-description: Manage your Mealie data; Foods, Units, Categories, Tags and more.
profile.data-migrations-description: Migrate your existing data from other applications like Nextcloud Recipes and Chowdown.
profile.show-advanced-description: Show advanced features (API Keys, Webhooks, and Data Management)

cookbook.description: Cookbooks are another way to organize recipes by creating cross sections of recipes and tags. Creating a cookbook will add an entry to the side-bar and all the recipes with the tags and categories chosen will be displayed in the cookbook.
cookbook.public-cookbook-description: Public Cookbooks can be shared with non-mealie users and will be displayed on your groups page.
cookbook.filter-options-description: When require all is selected the cookbook will only include recipes that have all of the items selected. This applies to each subset of selectors and not a cross section of the selected items.
